news.title: 金正恩钦定13岁女儿接班
韩国情报机构：金正恩选定女儿为接班人
news.title0: Kim Jong Un chooses teen daughter as heir, says Seoul
news.content: 韩国情报机构称，朝鲜领导人金正恩已选定其女儿金主爱为继承人。金主爱近期频繁陪同父亲出席重要公开活动。
news.content0: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un has selected his daughter as his heir, South Korea's spy agency told lawmakers on Thursday.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美国众议院投票推翻特朗普对加拿大关税
news.title0: US House votes to overturn Trump's tariffs on Canada
news.content: 美国众议院投票通过决议，寻求撤销特朗普总统去年对加拿大商品加征的关税。该决议仍需参议院批准并由总统签署。
news.content0: The US House of Representatives has voted to rescind US President Donald Trump's tariffs on Canadian goods.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美国司法部长邦迪为爱泼斯坦案处理辩护
news.title0: Four takeaways from Pam Bondi's fiery Epstein testimony
news.content: 美国司法部长帕姆·邦迪在国会听证会上为司法部处理爱泼斯坦文件的方式辩护，并与议员就移民执法等问题发生激烈交锋。
news.content0: US Attorney General Pam Bondi defended the justice department's handling of the Epstein files and faced a barrage of angry questions on other issues during a fiery congressional hearing on Wednesday.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 英国首相要求曼联老板为移民言论道歉
news.title0: Starmer tells Sir Jim Ratcliffe to apologise for saying UK 'colonised by immigrants'
news.content: 英国首相斯塔默批评曼联共同所有者吉姆·拉特克利夫爵士关于英国“被移民殖民”的言论，称其“冒犯且错误”，并要求其道歉。
news.content0: Sir Keir Starmer has labelled comments about immigration made by billionaire Manchester United co-owner Sir Jim Ratcliffe as "offensive and wrong".
news.author: BBC

news.title: 乌克兰钢架雪车选手因头盔被禁赛
news.title0: Ukrainian skeleton slider disqualified from Olympics after breaking IOC rules on helmet honoring dead compatriots
news.content: 乌克兰钢架雪车选手赫拉斯克维奇因坚持佩戴印有阵亡同胞图像的头盔，违反国际奥委会规定，被取消冬奥会参赛资格。
news.content0: Ukrainian skeleton sliderVladyslav Heraskevychhas been disqualified from theWinter Olympicsfor “refusing to adhere” to the International Olympic Committee’s (IOC) athlete expression guidelines regarding his insistence on wearing a helmet featuring images of athletes killed during the war inUkrainein competition.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 说唱歌手斯努普·狗狗出任冬奥教练
news.title0: Coach Snoop is having a blast at the Olympics
news.content: 美国说唱歌手斯努普·狗狗以教练身份亮相米兰-科尔蒂纳冬奥会，其独特的时尚造型成为赛场外的焦点。
news.content0: After delighting onlookers with a series of stylish cameos at the Paris Games in 2024, Snoop Dogg is back at the Olympics with a new, slightly more official, job: coach. The gig comes with a fresh wardrobe of looks cooler than the snow-capped Italian alps.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 美国能源高官访问委内瑞拉促能源改革
news.title0: Top U.S. Energy Official Presses Venezuela to Do More to Spur Investment
news.content: 美国能源部长克里斯·赖特访问委内瑞拉，敦促该国政府进一步开放能源行业以吸引外国投资，这是近三十年来美国高官首次访委。
news.content0: The U.S. Secretary of Energy Chris Wright arrived in Venezuela on Wednesday to press for a bolder overhaul of the energy industry, making it clear that the United States could use its standing as an economic colossus to achieve the aims.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 墨西哥麻疹疫情或致其“无麻疹”地位不保
news.title0: Mexico Risks Losing Its Measles-Free Status, Months Before Millions Arrive for World Cup
news.content: 麻疹疫情在墨西哥持续蔓延，该国可能失去保持了三十年的“无麻疹”地位，而此时距离世界杯开幕仅数月。
news.content0: Mexico, like its neighbors to the north, has been struggling to keep a resurgence of measles in check. Now, as the virus continues to spread and cases pile up, the country appears to be on the brink of losing a hard-won place among nations that have eliminated the disease.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 男子“死亡”40分钟后重生，感悟人生真谛
news.title0: I died for 40 minutes - here's what it taught me about life
news.content: 英国律师帕特里克·查恩利心脏骤停“临床死亡”40分钟后被救回，脑损伤改变了他的生活，但他表示更珍惜当下。
news.content0: Dying doesn't normally give a person new life - yet that is exactly what happened to Patrick Charnley.
news.author: BBC
